data.title: LeBron James next team odds: Cleveland Cavaliers, Phoenix Suns favored if he leaves Lakers
data.meta_description: LeBron James 2024 next team odds favor the Los Angeles Lakers, Cleveland Cavaliers, Phoenix Suns, Golden State Warriors and Philadelphia 76ers.
data.text:
The speculation and rumors surrounding LeBron James' future are swirling throughout the NBA.

And now you can even bet on James' next team.

DraftKings Sportsbook has odds listed for LeBron James' next team (or for his "next regular season minute played to be for which NBA team") and James' current team is an overwhelming favorite.

But a few other teams have higher odds than others.

Could LeBron James really leave the Los Angeles Lakers? If he did, which teams are the favorites to be his next team?

Check out what odds say about LeBron James' next NBA team for the 2024-25 regular season.

'Like father like sun': LeBron James NBA free agency countdown clock has Suns fans buzzing

Los Angeles Lakers huge favorite to retain LeBron James in odds

The Lakers are given -425 odds to continue to be LeBron James' next team, an overwhelming favorite in the odds.

According to the sportsbook, the odds appear to indicate that it likes James' chances to stay in Los Angeles.

Bronny James 2024 NBA Draft odds: Phoenix Suns' chances to pick LeBron James' son surge

Cleveland Cavaliers, Phoenix Suns favorites in odds for LeBron James, should he leave Lakers

Could LeBron James return to Cleveland? The Cavaliers are second in odds to be James' team next season, with odds at +750.

The Phoenix Suns are third in the odds to land James, at +1200 in the odds.

A lot of speculation has swirled over the past week about Phoenix potentially joining forces with his son, Bronny James, in Phoenix should the Suns draft him with the No. 22 pick in the 2024 NBA Draft.

More: Is LeBron James a good fit with Phoenix Suns? NBA insider raves about team's potential

Golden State Warriors, Philadelphia 76ers high in odds for LeBron James

The Golden State Warriors and Philadelphia 76ers round out the Top 5 in odds to be LeBron James' next team.

The Warriors are +1400 in the odds. The 76ers are at +2200.

Many people think that LeBron would be a great fit with those franchises, should he decide to opt out of his contract and become an NBA free agent.

More: LeBron James to Phoenix Suns speculation, rumors swirl with 'historic superteam' report

LeBron James' next team odds for every NBA franchise

The New York Knicks, Miami Heat and Dallas Mavericks are each at +2500 in odds to get LeBron James, the best odds outside of the Top 5 teams.

The longest odds? The Portland Trail Blazers, Charlotte Hornets and Washington Wizards are all at +20000.
